about_tedx.title: What is TEDx?
about_tedx.content_p1: TEDx is a program of local, self-organized events that bring people together to share a TED-like experience. At a TEDx event, TED Talks video and live speakers combine to spark deep discussion and connection in a small group.
about_tedx.content_p2: The x in TEDx stands for independently organized TED event. TEDx events are planned and coordinated independently, on a community-by-community basis, under a free license from TED.
about_tedx.content_p3: TEDx events follow the TED format and are organized independently with the TED spirit: ideas worth spreading.

about_upm.title: About TEDxUPM
about_upm.intro_subtitle: From a city that inspires minds to ideas told to the world
about_upm.content_intro:
Here... where the brilliance of history meets the radiance of the soul,
And where hospitality transcends service to become a feeling that touches the heart before the place.
This year's edition of <0>TEDx </0>UPM presents an event not merely to be watched,
But to be experienced deeply and to leave its mark.
An event that brings together the light of ideas worth spreading,
The light of the city that has inspired the world for centuries,
And the light of inspiration born when human experience intersects with the deep-rooted values of this place.
about_upm.tourism_content:
In alignment with the objectives of Saudi Vision 2030 to make Madinah a leading global destination, Prince Muqrin University has adopted this year's <0>TEDx </0>UPM event with tourism as a central theme, within an integrated ecosystem of fields including culture and heritage, visitor experience and hospitality, smart tourism, entrepreneurship, leadership, and change-making. This reflects the diversity of opportunities and the integration of roles in developing the city, stemming from the university's position as one of the first universities globally to offer specialized academic programs in international tourism and hospitality.

The event also targets complementary groups with direct impact, including entrepreneurs and innovators, companies and the private sector, those interested in culture, heritage, and hospitality, as well as investors in tourism and services, to support an integrated dialogue that connects ideas with reality and contributes to creating a sustainable impact in partnership with relevant entities.
